name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Advice
description: This is a repository of advice APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: HealthTap
apis.description: Secure video or text chat with a doctor anywhere, anytime, 24/7 - get prescriptions, referrals, second opinions and more. Or get trusted answers and tips from tens of thousands of Board Certified doctors now for FREE.
